readlater - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
refresh() - Method in class activity.AllTopicPageActivity
When the Internet is on : reload all new top level comments in to the ListView and let the NetworkObserver keep checking if the network goes off.
refresh() - Method in class activity.CommentPageActivity
When the Internet is on : reload all information regard to this Comment and let the NetworkObserver keep checking if the network goes off.

replySpecificComment(String, String) - Method in class network_io.IoStreamHandler
Load a specific Comment by it's id and add an reply comment's id to this comment's reply IdSet, then update the Comment to the server.
